edu.stanford.cs.pptx

Class PPSlide

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.PPSlide
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PPCodeDisplaySlide, PPCodeTraceSlide

    public class PPSlide
extends Object
    This class corresponds to a single PowerPoint slide. Each slide consists primarily of a list of shapes and an animation timeline.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PPSlide()
      Creates a new empty slide.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(PPShape shape)
      Adds the specified shape to the slide at the top of the z-axis ordering.
      void add(PPShape shape, double x, double y)
      Adds the specified shape to this slide and sets its location to the point (x, y).
      void addTitle(String title)
      Adds a title to this slide.
      Color getBackground()
      Returns the background color used in this slide.
      double getHeight()
      Returns the height of this slide in pixels.
      PPShape[] getShapes()
      Returns an array of the shapes contained in this slide, arranged from back to front in terms of the z-axis ordering.
      String getTitle()
      Returns the title of this slide.
      PPTextShape getTitleShape()
      Returns the text shape containing the title.
      double getWidth()
      Returns the width of this slide in pixels.
      void sendToBack(PPShape shape)
      Sends the specified shape to the back of the z-ordering.
      void sendToFront(PPShape shape)
      Sends the specified shape to the front of the z-ordering.
      void setBackground(Color color)
      Sets the background color for this slide.
      void setTransition(String transition)
      Sets the transition string for this slide.
      String toString()
      Returns a printable string representation of this slide.

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

                double x,
                double y)

        x - The x-coordinate of the shape
        y - The y-coordinate of the shape

      • setBackground

        public void setBackground(Color color)
        Sets the background color for this slide. If this value is null, the slide inherits the background color for the slide show.
        Parameters:
        color - The background color for the slide show

      • getBackground

        public Color getBackground()
        Returns the background color used in this slide. If this value is null, the slide inherits the background color for the slide show.
        Returns:
        The background color
